data.title: Emergency Broadband Benefit
data.author: Dave Guarino
data.excerpt: The federal Emergency Broadband Benefit can help you pay for your broadband internet costs. Benefit details The Emergency Broadband Benefit provides: $50 a month off your broadband internet bill $75 a month if you live on Tribal lands $100 discount towards the purchase of a laptop or tablet Who’s eligible A temporary program that will […]
